original_text: Paul and Barnabas argued strongly about this. They could not agree, so they went in different directions. Barnabas took John Mark with him and they sailed to Cyprus.
korean_text: 서로 심히 다투어 피차 갈라서니 바나바는 마가를 데리고 배 타고 구브로로 가고

sentences.original_text: Paul and Barnabas argued strongly about this.
sentences.korean_translation: 바울과 바나바는 이 문제로 격렬하게 다투었습니다.

sentences.original_text: so they went in different directions.
Barnabas took John Mark with him
